data.message: i know that u were in tha hospita;l wit me kidrock and alot others kept us apart i knew it was u tho wen i was aloud to speak 4 myself told tha doc tha truth like i helped you crazy ass don't u remember that doc little and doc cranden i wouldn't drink crea,mer in you coffer it was me talknin bout heroin  k dawg so u could get some meds that were mine they are dikes all tha weme n wanted me they knew who u were and me so they still didn't give me all my meds were on twice a day til monday....so u should be feeling better tha bitch took one outa my bottle that wad parkdside pharmacy and little testing themin tha bottle it ,metodone u want me to stay up all nite so i will so do tha doctors m n east
